properties.areaDesc: Juneau Borough and Northern Admiralty Island; Haines Borough and Lynn Canal
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 19 at 9:13AM AKST until January 20 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8
inches.

* WHERE...Haines Borough and Lynn Canal and Juneau Borough and
Northern Admiralty Island.

* WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall through this morning of 2 to 4
inches. Snowfall will diminish this evening.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit
511.alaska.gov.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT FOR THE NORTHERN INNER CHANNELS
